element.name: TCustomJSONPropStorage.JSONFileName
element.short: Full path and name of the file containing the values
element.descr: This String expresses the full path and name of the file that contains the Form Session Properties values you have chosen to save

element.name: TCustomJSONPropStorage.RootObjectPath
element.short: JSON Path for the Root Object
element.descr: This String contains a path to the Root Object that will encapsulate all the Session Properties of this Form.
